text:
Anyone else gets a dev server error that the config file is missing scopes? the only one I'm missing is graphql due to the portal not having the subscription. Dev server doesnt work at all and no field values or hublData loads

```StatusCodeError: 403 - {"status":"error","message":"This app hasn't been granted all required scopes to make this call. Read more about required scopes here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/scopes>.","correlationId":"57c12ef2-5d28-44f4-bcdb-797b5f43cfb7","errors":[{"message":"One or more of the following scopes are required.","context":{"requiredScopes":["cms.functions.read"]}}],"links":{"scopes":"<https://developers.HubSpot.com/scopes>"},"category":"MISSING_SCOPES"}```
